description: Allows the mob to take a load off and snack on food that it found nearby.
title: Snacking

snacking_cooldown.title: Snacking Cooldown
snacking_cooldown.description: The cooldown time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again.

snacking_cooldown_min.title: Snacking Cooldown Minimum
snacking_cooldown_min.description: The minimum time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again.

snacking_stop_chance.title: Snacking Stop Chance
snacking_stop_chance.description: This is the chance that the mob will stop snacking, from 0 to 1.

items.title: Items
items.description: Items that we are interested in snacking on.
